gurmukhi: tr Dr jwXM ] Tr hir pwXM ]
transliteration: Tar Dhar Jaayan|| Thar Har(i) Paayan||
translation: He who advances to that side goes straight to the feet of the Lord (i.e. he is killed).
Hearing the knocks on the shields, the god of death came down.134.

gurmukhi: Ar br drxM ] nr br hrxM ]
transliteration: Ar Bar Daranan|| Nar Bar Haranan||
translation: The superb enemies were killed and the eminent men were destroyed.

gurmukhi: Dr br DIrM ] Pr hr qIrM ]135]
transliteration: Dhar Bar Dhderan|| Phar Har Tderan||135||
translation: On the bodies of the enduring warriors, the arrows waved.135.

gurmukhi: br nr drxM ] Br hr krxM ]
transliteration: Bar Nar Daranan|| Bhar Har Karanan||
translation: The eminent persons were destroyed and the remaining sped away.

gurmukhi: hr hr rVqw ] br hr gVqw ]136]
transliteration: Har Har Radtaa|| Bar Har Gadtaa||136||
translation: The repeated Shivaâ€™s name and created confusion.136.
Had power of to destroy all in the war, his arms were long.137.
The brave fighters struck blows and the rosary of skulls on the neck of Shiva looked impressive.
Ram stood firmly and within the whole place, there was turmoil.138.

gurmukhi: crpt CIgw ky Awd kiRq CMd ]
transliteration: Charpat Chheegad Ke Aad Krit Chhand||
translation: CHARPAT CHHIGA KE AAD KRIT STANZA
In the use of the sword the noteworthy and greatly wise persons are being seen.
Those with beautiful bodies are wearing armours which seen like portraits.139.
Those who are specialists in arm and scholars of Shastras;
